title: Walking in Paris - primary effect of using a list

content.prompt: In lines 30-31 (“my husband...hot baths”), the primary effect of using a list is to

choices.label: establish the speaker’s inability to support her family
demonstrate how the speaker’s routine has been organized
emphasize the speaker’s detachment from her daily life
highlight the speaker’s aversion to daily customs

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
